trans-unit.source: Transforms data in a Web Parts connection from a provider that implements the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartRow"></xref> interface to a consumer expecting data through the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartField"></xref> interface.
Transformers are used to translate data between two Web Parts controls with incompatible connection points.

A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToFieldTransformer> object transforms data from a provider implementing the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartRow> interface to a consumer requiring data from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartField> interface.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToFieldTransformer> class allows controls with these incompatible connection points to be connected.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToFieldTransformer"></xref> class.

Displays an ASP.NET control that configures a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToFieldTransformer"></xref> transformer in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone"></xref> zone.
A Web Parts connection can be established statically or dynamically.
A static connection is defined within the `<StaticConnections>` tag.
A user can define a dynamic connection when a connections zone is included in a web page and the user is in the connect mode.
When establishing a dynamic connection, the user defines the connection through a configuration control.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToFieldTransformer.CreateConfigurationControl%2A> method returns the control that the user interacts with to define the connection.

The configuration control for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToFieldTransformer> object allows a user to connect or disconnect a provider and consumer, and select which field from the provider row to connect with the data field of the consumer.
It is displayed in the connections zone.
The user's configuration settings will be saved, and loaded on the next visit.
An ASP.NET control that configures a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToFieldTransformer"></xref>.
Gets or sets the name of the value to transform.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToFieldTransformer.FieldName%2A> property represents the data from the provider row that will be transformed for the consumer.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToFieldTransformer.FieldName%2A> property can be set by the user through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToFieldTransformer> configuration control, or set declaratively in the `<asp:RowToFieldTransformer FieldName="`*selectedField*`" />` tag, where *selectedField* contains the name of the field to transform.
A <xref href="System.String"></xref> containing the name of the field to transform.
Provides an object for transforming the data.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToFieldTransformer.Transform%2A> method provides an object for transforming the provider data from the type <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartRow> to the type <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartField> so it can be used by the consumer.
The provider data to be transformed.
An <xref href="System.Object"></xref> representing the data to be transformed.
Returns the value of the field that is being used by the interface as the basis of a connection between two Web Parts controls.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToFieldTransformer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartField> interface.
The delegate instance to be used when retrieving a value.
callback equals `null`.
Gets the schema information for a data field that is used to share data between two Web Parts controls.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.RowToFieldTransformer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartField> interface.
A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> describing the data schema.
